title: This eSIM is a great stocking stuffer for travelers, now under $20
content:
Macworld

If you’re struggling to find a gift for the globetrotter on your list, consider something digital and practical: aloSIM, a digital eSIM that can help them avoid high data roaming charges while traveling.

A practical last-minute present for any traveler, aloSIM is now on sale for only $19.97 (reg. $50) and even comes with $50 of data credits. No need to worry about shipping with this digital gift!

With aloSIM, your favorite adventurer can enjoy affordable data across over 170 countries worldwide. It’s easy to set up, too. All your giftee needs to do before hitting the road or skies is to choose an aloSIM data package and install it on any compatible device. Then, they can activate it once they arrive at their destination. 

aloSIM never expires, though data packages are only valid for as long as stated when purchased. For example, if your giftee snags a seven-day data plan, it’ll expire at the end of seven days, even if not all the data has been used. Need a data top-up? It’s easy to grab more, as some data packages start at only $4.50 for a whole week.

This holiday season, gift your favorite globetrotter more affordable data access with the aloSIM eSIM, which comes with $50 of data credit for just $19.97 through January 1 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific. No coupon is needed to score this exclusive offer!
